com.clarkparsia.openrdf
Class ExtGraph

java.lang.Object
  com.clarkparsia.openrdf.DelegatingGraph
      com.clarkparsia.openrdf.ExtGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Statement>, java.util.Collection<Statement>, Graph
public class ExtGraph
extends DelegatingGraph

Extends the DelegatingGraph class to provide additional convenience methods for working with a graph object.

Since:
0.1
Version:
0.4
Author:
Michael Grove
See Also:
Serialized Form

filter

public ExtGraph filter(Predicate<Statement> thePredicate)
Return a sub-graph where all the statements pass the supplied Predicate filter

Parameters:
thePredicate - the filter
Returns:
the graph of statements that pass the filter

getStatements

public java.util.Iterator<Statement> getStatements(Resource theSubj,
                                                   URI thePred,
                                                   Value theObject)
Alias for the DelegatingGraph.match(org.openrdf.model.Resource, org.openrdf.model.URI, org.openrdf.model.Value, org.openrdf.model.Resource...) method

Parameters:
theSubj - the subject to match, or null for wildcard
thePred - the predicate to match, or null for wildcard
theObject - the object to match, or null for wildcard
Returns:
an iterator over all the statements which match the given spo pattern

getValue

public Value getValue(Resource theSubj,
                      URI thePred)
Return the value of the property for the given subject. If there are multiple values, only the first value will be returned. Use getValues(org.openrdf.model.Resource, org.openrdf.model.URI) if you want all values for the property.

Parameters:
theSubj - the subject
thePred - the property of the subject whose value should be retrieved
Returns:
the value of the the property for the subject, or null if there is no value.

getValues

public java.util.Collection<Value> getValues(Resource theSubj,
                                             URI thePred)
Return an Iterable over all the values of the property on the given resource

Parameters:
theSubj - the resource
thePred - the property
Returns:
all values of the property on the resource.

getLiteral

public Literal getLiteral(Resource theSubj,
                          URI thePred)
Return the value of of the property as a Literal

Parameters:
theSubj - the resource
thePred - the property whose value is to be retrieved
Returns:
the property value as a literal, or null if the value is not a literal, or the property does not have a value

Returns all the instances of the specified type

Parameters:
theType - the type for instances to return
Returns:
all instances in the graph rdf:type'd to the given type.

getBooleanValue

public java.lang.Boolean getBooleanValue(Resource theSubj,
                                         URI thePred)
Returns the value of the property on the given resource as a boolean.

Parameters:
theSubj - the resource
thePred - the property
Returns:
the value of the property as a boolean, or null if it doesnt have a value, or if the value is not a boolean.

isList

public boolean isList(Resource theRes)
Returns whether or not the given resource is a rdf:List

Parameters:
theRes - the resource to check
Returns:
true if its a list, false otherwise

Parameters:
theRes - the resouce which is the head of the list
Returns:
the contents of the list.
